about_the_game:
Piano Rocker is a rhythm game designed with MIDI Controllers and e-pianos in mind. Jam along your favourite songs or test your keyboard skills in a variety of mini-games built around keyboard fundamentals.

Multiple song modes available:
- 2d-mode (inspired by Japanese arcade classics)
- 3d-mode (modern western games with plastic instruments)

Add your own charts or import existing songs from other popular rhythm games (Phase Shift Real Keyboard charts are supported at the moment, BMS might be added later on).
